description: Instant Pot Black Eyed Peas Rice Pulao - Brown Rice Lobia Pulao. Black Eyes Peas and Rice cooked with spices and veggies. Saucepan option. Vegan Gluten free 1 Pot Nut free Soy free Recipe
keywords: black eyed peas and rice, black eyes pea pulao, instant pot black eyed peas
name: Instant Pot Black Eyed Peas Pulao - Brown Rice Lobia Pulao
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup raw or roasted peanuts (, or use cashews (or sunflower seeds or dalia(roasted chickpeas) for nutfree)
1/2 to 1 tsp garam masala (or 1 to 1.5 tsp biryani masala)
1/3 tsp cayenne (less or more to preference)

recipeInstructions.text: Soak the black eyed peas and basmati rice in hot water for 20-30 minutes. In the meanwhile, prep and follow the next steps.

Press saute mode on IP. Add oil and let it get hot. Add the seeds and cloves and cook for half a minute. Add the nuts and cook for a minute to roast. Add the onion, ginger, garlic, and chile and a pinch of salt and cook for 2 minutes. Stir occasionally.
Add the ground spices (turmeric through cayenne) and mix in. Add the tomato and peppers and mix in. Cook for a minute.
Drain the black eyed peas and rice and add to the pot. Add water and salt and mix in.
Pressure cook for 18 to 20 minutes. Let the pressure release naturally.
Taste and adjust salt. Add more garam masala or other spices if needed and mix in.
Add a good dash of lemon and cilantro, some chopped red onion and serve with pappadum or crackers. I also like the pulao with some kachumbar salad.

I love beans + rice and I love roasted peanuts or other nuts in pulao(spiced rice). This version uses black eyed peas and brown rice and is a mix of a few pulao styles across Indian cuisine. Add whichever spices you have (other cuisines blends such as Jamaican curry, cajun work too!), and veggies of choice.

Black eyed Peas (Lobia/Chawli/Raungi) are often ignored in favor of various beans, chickpeas or split peas. But these beans are so smooth and soft and have their own fantastic flavor. Try this Black Eyes Peas and Rice Pulao. Glutenfree, Soyfree, Easily Nutfree. Saucepan option.
